channel.title: Products – Medika Supplies
channel.description: Supply quality products to the medical industries

item.title: 1L General Purpose Bowl
item.dc:creator: siaru1
item.description:
Steady when standing due to flat bottom surface.
Strong sides so able to support weight of contents when full.
Easy to store (product is stackable) and separate.
Steady when standing due to flat bottom surface.
Multi-purpose – can be used for a multitude of functions, such as carrying instruments, dressings and liquids.
Easy to carry when full.
item.content:encoded:
Description:  1L General Purpose Bowl

Part No: 400-063025

Qty: 1 x Box = 200 units

Usage per week for 1 x Macerator

item.title: 4L Wash Bowl
item.dc:creator: siaru1
item.description:
Multi-purpose – can be used for a range of functions such as hand washing, wound care, shaving and bed baths.
Unique ribbed design that allows it to remain rigid and stable even when filled to capacity with hot water.
Free of PFOA (Perfluorooctanoic acid, also known as C8 – a known carcinogen.
Ideal for use as washing bowl with detergent and hot water in the bowl.
Reduced risk of cross contamination as a single use..
Easy to carry and hold when full and easy to store (product is stackable) and separate
Graduated to aid liquid measurement.
item.content:encoded:
Description:   4L Wash Bowl

Part No:   400-063023

Qty:   1 x Box = 50 units

Usage per week for 1 x Macerator (20 bed ward) = 100 units

item.title: 4L Wash Bowl Dispenser Rack
item.dc:creator: siaru1
item.description: Wall-mounted rack removes items from surfaces. Suitable for use with the detergent proof Wash Bowl.
item.content:encoded:
Description:   4L Wash Bowl Dispenser Rack

Part No:   400-063017

Qty required for 1 x Macerator (20 bed ward) = 1

item.title: ACTIVA 700
item.dc:creator: siaru1
item.description:
13 Face-Skin G-Pulse © – 60 Beauty – 58 Fitness – 53 Sport 21 Special Sports – 12 Tens – 3 Rehabilitation – 3 Incontinence 12 Microcurrents – 36 “3S” Serial Sequential Stimulation
ADVANCED TECHNOLOGIES IN THE NEW 2013 RANGE Globus presents an innovative technology intended to revolutionize the electrostimulation application in beauty, sport and medical fields: 3S (Serial Sequential Stimulation) technology.
“3S” SERIAL SEQUENTIAL STIMULATION: The sequential contraction of the different muscular groups produces a deep pressure wave in the musculature involved causing the interstitial fluid drainage and enhancing the return of the venous blood to the heart.
FACE-SKIN TREATMENTS: ACTIVA 700 offers the new innovative and regenerative G-PULSE currents, proposed for Aesthetic and Beauty applications and able to regenerate the collagen production in the tissues.
G-TRODE HEAD: ACTIVA 700 is equipped with a special head that permits, using the G-PULSE programs, to obtain a more effective skin stimulation.
NEW TRENDY CARRYING CASE: ACTIVA 700 is supplied with a practical modern carrying case in aluminum and eco leather that can be carried in an easy way and that makes you feel always fashionable.
FACE AND BREAST AREA: ACTIVA 700 is equipped with a complete set of programs for face and breast toning
SPECIAL SPORTS: a special program list to stimulate in an effective and specific manner the muscular areas used in the more common sport activities.
MULTI-USER: it permits to store up to 10 different users and to create a library of personalized programs depending on individual aims.
AUTOMATIC MODE (AUTO STIM®): it permits to execute a program in automatic mode with no need of intervening manually in the intensity regulation.
SYNCROSTIM: It is possible to increase the intensity of the 4 channels simultaneously using only one button.
RUN TIME FUCTION: this function permits to modify the time, the frequency and the pulse amplitude during the treatment
PROGRAMMABLE: 10 free memories, only for EMS and TENS. 2+2 MODE: it permits to execute two different programs simultaneously. FAVORITES: it permits to store up to 15 programs for each user LAST 10: it stores the last 10 executed programs WORKING TIME: It indicates the total usage time of the device MY TRAINER: it shows the electrode position on the display STIM LOCK
item.content:encoded:
TECHNICAL FEATURES
Channels: 4 independent CHANNELS
Frequency: 0,3 – 150 Hz
Power: 120 mA per channel
Pulse amplitude: 40 – 450 μs
Wave form: Square, biphasic,
symmetrical, compensated
Power supply: rechargeable battery
Back-lit display
Device in II A class
In compliance with the directive
93/42/CEE-2007/47/CEE

EQUIPMENT
1 carrying case
1 ACTIVA 700 electrostimulator
1 G-Trode head
4 electrostimulation cables and 2
microcurrent cables
4 self-adhesive square electrodes and 4
self-adhesive rectangular electrodes
1 Gel bottle
1 Charger
1 Operating manual

item.title: Atlanta A&E Patient Trolley
item.dc:creator: siaru1
item.description: The Atlanta Transport Trolley is suitable for patient examination, full X-Ray and resuscitation, within a variety of acute healthcare departments. The trolley incorporates an easily accessible full length X-Ray cassette platform, is easily manoeuvrable, as the trolley features a 5th wheel steering system and centrally located foot pedals for controlling height adjustment, trendelenburg and reverse trendelenburg tilt. The backrest is fully adjustable to almost 90° with an easily accessbile release lever. A deluxe 100mm mattress with pressure reducing design and a safe working load of 250kg is included as standard. Download PDF
item.content:encoded:
Model PTX1403 – Standard Model Specification

  • Full length easy accessible X-Ray facility
  • Excellent height range of 58-91 cm
  • Hydraulic foot pedals at both sides of the trolley to adjust height and tilt
  • Moulded easy to clean patient support surface for mattress
  • Trendelenburg tilt of -16°
  • Reverse trendelenburg tilt of +16°
  • Twin Powered gas strut assisted backrest from 0 to +90°
  • Safe working load of 250 kgs
  • Central locking braking wheel system with Tente® 200mm castors and directional lock 5th wheel steering system (dia 125mm)
  • Anti-bacterial wipe clean base cover with integral oxygen cylinder holder (upto size F)
  • Integral fold down side support rails
  • Dual push / pull handles
  • IV pole included as standard with 4 fitting locations and integrated storage tube
  • Storage tray in base cover for patient belongings
  • Dimensions: W77cm x L208cm
  • Wide range of optional accessories
  • Mattress included as Standard

Optional Accessories

  • Additional IV Pole with (Model PT1410)
  • Additional Push and pull transport handle (Model PT1490)
  • Paper Roll Holder (Model PT1405)
  • Monitor shelf (Model PT1440)
  • DIN rail attachment for ventilation device (Model PT1460)
  • Replacement AtlantaFlex Deluxe 100mm Mattress (Model PT1470)

item.title: Atlanta Transport Trolley
item.dc:creator: siaru1
item.description: The Atlanta Transport Trolley is suitable for patient examination, treatment, recovery and transportation within a variety of acute healthcare departments. Easily manoeuvrable, the trolley features a 5th wheel steering system and centrally located foot pedals for controlling height adjustment, trendelenburg and reverse trendelenburg tilt. The backrest is fully adjustable to almost 90° with an easily accessbile release lever. A deluxe 100mm mattress with pressure reducing design and a safe working load of 250kg is included as standard. Download PDF
item.content:encoded:
Model PT1402 – Standard Model Specification

  • Excellent height range of 52-85 cm
  • Hydraulic foot pedals at both sides of the trolley to adjust height and tilt
  • Moulded easy to clean patient support surface for mattress
  • Trendelenburg tilt of -16°
  • Reverse trendelenburg tilt of +16°
  • Twin Powered gas strut assisted backrest from 0 to +90°
  • Safe working load of 250 kgs
  • Central locking braking wheel system with Tente® 200mm castors and directional lock 5th wheel steering system (dia 125mm)
  • Anti-bacterial wipe clean base cover with integral oxygen cylinder holder (upto size F)
  • Integral fold down side support rails
  • Dual push / pull handles
  • IV pole included as standard with 4 fitting locations and integrated storage tube
  • Storage tray in base cover for patient belongings
  • Dimensions: W77cm x L208cm
  • Wide range of optional accessories
  • Mattress included as Standard

Optional Accessories

  • Additional IV Pole with (Model PT1410)
  • Additional Push and pull transport handle (Model PT1490)
  • Paper Roll Holder (Model PT1405)
  • Monitor shelf (Model PT1440)
  • DIN rail attachment for ventilation device (Model PT1460)
  • Replacement AtlantaFlex Deluxe 100mm Mattress (Model PT1470)

item.title: B-MAT
item.dc:creator: siaru1
item.description: Bed Mat is a true mat made up of 4 interchangeable sections, each containing 4 solenoids. The Bed Mat has been devised to be placed on a traditional bed mattress, enabling users to perform magnetotherapy treatments during sleep. Bed Mat takes benefit from magnetic fields to treat the main musculoskeletal disorders such as arthrosis, osteoporosis, arthritis, etc.
item.content:encoded:
B-Mat is available in three versions:
 B-Mat 200 the mat is made up of two active sections containing 8 solenoids, and of two neutral sections without solenoids. The sections containing solenoids can be shifted to different body parts according to individual needs.
 B-Mat 300 The mat is made up of three active sections containing 12 solenoids, and of one neutral section without solenoids. The sections containing solenoids can be shifted to different body parts according to individual needs.
 B-Mat 400 the mat is made up of four active sections containing 16 solenoids.

item.title: Balance Gear HC-BG-A1
item.dc:creator: siaru1
item.description:
ALDA Balance Gear is revolutionary wearable device that makes "Human Balance" measurement and training easy and available outside clinic environment. 1. Measurement and training in one device 2. Real time data collection 3. CSV data for Medicare analysis
Item No. HC-BG-A1
Product Name Balance Gear
Country of Original Taiwan
Material Polycarbonate
Product Spec. Balance Gear Sensor: W56.8 x D48 x H16.5 mm / USB Receiver: W46.6 x D28.5 x H10.2 mm
Package Size 11.5x11.5x7.5cm
Color Dark Grey
Carton Size 59.7x24.3x9.7cm / 10 sets
N.W. 2.7KGS
G.W. 3.1KGS
MOQ 10 sets
item.content:encoded:
Improve Your Balance For Outstanding Performance
Improve Your Balance for Safe Performance The ALDA Balance Gear is a wearable device to improve your body balance with real-time evaluation and training guideline to reduce your chances of falling, thereby increasing your mobility, and improving life quality.

Alda Balance Gear is revolutionary wearable device that makes “Human Balance” measurement and training easy and available outside clinic environment. Being connected to any PC/NB , the light-weighted Alda Balance Gear enables senior people or stroked people to regain their personal balance control by wearing it on the back of their body. The report collected from the customized training program provides info to all clinic or academic institute how an unbalanced people behaves himself to regain Balance.

Advantage
1. No burden for user
2. Efficient in operation
3. Measurement and training in one device
4. Real time data collection
5. Dynamic measurement and training
6. Low investment
7. Cost effective
8. Easy Operation & Storage
9. CSV data for Medicare analysis
10. Off site operation
